title: Cant get a free chest when I get S ranking. Says there's 4 available, gotten no chests for a month.
body: Gotten no chests for a month, gotten plenty of S rankings, lots of key fragments, says 4 available on my account profile. Please...

replies.body:
There are a number of reasons you may not be getting chests, so do let me know if any of them apply.

1. You do not own the champion you are playing
2. You have already received a chest on that champion for this season (In your profile under champions it will show a gold border around their portrait)
3. The S grade was not in your premade
4. You are on or have had a recent restriction of some kind (though I'm fairly certain you can't get key fragments either in this case so I do not believe this to be your issue)

From your match history it's looking like all of those S grades you got were on Ryze, and since you can only earn one chest per champion per season, that's why you aren't getting more chests. 

Try playing some normals with a premade every now and again to get chests on other champions. Remember that you don't have to earn the S grade, as long as the S is in your premade you will still receive a chest provided you own the champ you are playing and haven't received a chest on them already.
